# llms.txt - Generative Engine Optimization File
# This file helps AI crawlers and LLMs understand the structure and content of FrameTracking

# Site Information
Site: FrameTracking
Description: Real-time Warframe game data tracking dashboard
Purpose: Track active alerts, fissures, events, invasions, bounties, sorties, and more for Warframe players
Language: en

# Disclaimer
NOT AFFILIATED: FrameTracking is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or connected to Digital Extremes or Warframe in any way, shape, or form. This is an independent fan-made tool for the Warframe community.

# Main Routes
Primary Pages:
  / - Dashboard with customizable cards for all game data
  /alerts - Active Warframe alerts
  /events - Current in-game events
  /fissures - Void fissures (normal and Steel Path)
  /invasions - Active invasions
  /bounties - Open world bounties
  /archon-hunt - Archon Hunt information
  /arbitration - Arbitration missions
  /cycles - Open world cycles (Cetus, Vallis, Cambion)
  /sortie - Daily sortie missions
  /news - Latest Warframe news

# Platform Support
Platforms: PC, PS4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch

# Data Types
Content Types:
  - Alerts (mission alerts with rewards)
  - Events (temporary in-game events)
  - Fissures (void fissure missions for relic cracking)
  - Invasions (faction invasions)
  - Bounties (open world bounties)
  - Sorties (daily high-level missions)
  - Archon Hunts (weekly archon missions)
  - Arbitrations (endless missions)
  - Cycles (day/night cycles for open worlds)
  - News (official Warframe news)

# Update Frequency
Data Refresh: Real-time (updated every 45-60 seconds)

# API Endpoints
API Routes:
  /api/warframe/alerts
  /api/warframe/events
  /api/warframe/fissures
  /api/warframe/invasions
  /api/warframe/bounties
  /api/warframe/sortie
  /api/warframe/archonHunt
  /api/warframe/arbitration
  /api/warframe/cycles
  /api/warframe/news

# Contact
For questions about this site's content, refer to the main dashboard at /
